Description:
Super Block! – 994m2 – Central Dandenong
Located close to the Dandenong Hospital precinct this sturdy home is a fantastic opportunity for either a developer, investor or home buyer.
With an array of features including; a separate formal lounge, 4 bedrooms, study, 9ft ceilings and ducted heating throughout. The country style kitchen is conventional and functional and the main bathroom is conveniently located to service all rooms. Garaging is supplied by the 3 car brick garage which has ample room for vehicles and a workshop. All of this on a block of 994m2 (15.24m x 65.2m) ideal for multi-unit development (S.T.C.A.). The location is 2nd to none…within walking distance to Chisholm TAFE, Dandenong Hospital, Oasis pools, bus services and so much more! This will be the first chance (and possibly the last) to buy this property…never offered for sale before…don’t miss it!
Insights: 19 Sheales Street, Dandenong VIC 3175 was last sold in 2017 and 28 other 4 bedroom house in Dandenong have recently been sold.

Description:
Enviable Modern Beginning or A Great Investment!
Set privately behind a classic brick and hedge fencing, this home provides the brightest & most essential modern lifestyle distinctly different from the rest. With renovations through the home and moments to all major amenities, there’s nothing to do but move in.
Showcasing inside 3 spacious bedrooms, a large modern bathroom, 2 separate toilets, a fully appointed modern kitchen with open meals area, and a well-lit & spacious formal lounge with Inverter Split System A/C & central ducted heating – you’d be the envy of all your friends.
Beyond the front fence we find room for several car accommodations towards the paved front driveway leading to a secure side gate with room for storing a trailer or small boat and discover an expansive and generous backyard with new turf, where entertaining in the fresh outdoors and sitting back and relaxing on the new sturdy timber decking with family and friends will leave a calming sense of pride.
Being only a short stroll to Dandenong Market, Hospital and Chisholm TAFE, both primary and secondary schools and all other major amenities including public transport - you can't beat this enviable location, so if you're looking for your first home or a great investment, and good value is on the checklist, then contact us and inspect for yourself.

Description:
Two Months Till completion! Quality Built One, Two & Three Bedroom Apartments!
Whether youâ??re a downsizer, first home buyer or investor, these apartments are the perfect opportunity! Sitting in a fantastic location close to Dandenong plaza, Dandenong market, train stations, buses, schools and much more, an inspection is an absolute must with these stunning apartments.
With only 12 apartments on this boutique block you have a choice of one, two or three bedrooms and the option of one or two bathrooms. All the apartments have been carefully designed with open plan living in mind with well positioned dining, living and kitchen areas. The apartments boast either a large balcony or courtyard garden for that extra space needed for entertaining guests. All apartments include an undercover car park featured at the back end of the property.
As an added bonus, you receive individual split systems to cut back on heating/cooling an entire apartment, which helps cut back on expensive utility bills, tiled bathroom/s, european style laundry and extra storage space. Call now to arrange an inspection!

Luxury Investment at 5% Return Or Live In
Located in the heart of Dandenong, walking distance to Dandenong Plaza, Dandenong Market, public transport and schools, this modern complex, with a stylish interior, will provide the easiest lifetstyle.
Comprised of two generous bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom, open plan kitchen/living area with quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone bench tops, separate laundry and balcony.
With an oversized split system for heating and cooling, secure basement car parking and secure entrance, this apartment has everything you could possibly need. Currently returning $1,434 pcm to a fantastic tenant on a periodic lease, purchase as an investment or move in.

A great start Sold by Charles Raj
Set in the stylish Mosaic apartment complex, this apartment will suit a first home buyer or a single or an investor featuring
- One bedroom with built in robe and bathroom and a toilet
- Open plan living with kitchen, dining and living area
- Balcony overlooking the Courtyard
- Modern bathroom with European laundry
- Kitchen with Stainless steel appliances gas cook top and dishwasher

This property is only minutes' walk to the Dandenong train station, bus stop and restaurants.
Please call the agent for a private inspection. Opens on Saturdays and photo ID required at the open homes.

This property would appeal to a 1st homebuyer or investor looking to maximise their return in this thriving suburb of Dandenong. Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity!

Description:
Most Affordable 2 Bedroom Unit!
Offering this well-maintained brick veneer unit. Being only one of three on the block means you won't feel too cramped. Is ideal for first home buyers and downsizers, if you’re looking for a low maintenance home or a great return on investment then this is it.
If you've been waiting for a home that is ready to move into with nothing else to do, consisting of rejuvenated kitchen and bathroom, polished floorboards and redone floor tiles in the bathroom, this home has been brought back to life and is ready for a new owner.
Each bedroom is complete with built in robes, reverse cycle split system and gas heating unit in the lounge and a private courtyard you can enjoy this home all year round.
Only minutes away from all the amenities Dandenong has to offer, this is the perfect position for those wanting to be within walking distance to the shops whilst maintaining a sense of quietness away from the bustle of the main thoroughfare.
This home will certainly tick the boxes for a wide range of buyers including established family and first home buyers, be quick as this property will not last long.
Don’t let this opportunity slip away!
Call today for more information.
Contact Lee Faisal on 0415 423 964 or Mateen Issak on 0421 491 891.

Description:
Large family home with Dual Occupancy bonus!
A great first home or super investment with options on a 603m2 (approx) block – you decide! Single storey at the front, double storey at the rear with views over the park next door and surrounding district from the upper floor balcony.
Features 3 bedrooms, separate dining room (which was a 4th bedroom and can be easily converted back), spacious lounge room, updated kitchen and bathroom, upstairs at the rear is a large bedroom with bathroom / toilet and balcony that also could be used as another living area, lock up garage plus extra under cover and off street parking for 4 cars, undercover entertaining area and big backyard for the kids to enjoy.
Sale by SET DATE: Monday 30th October at 6pm (unless sold prior)
Comes with the added bonus of the ability to build another dwelling at the rear either now or in the future with plans submitted and subject to council approval.
Great rental return where investors have the option to rent out as one home or increase the return to @ $500 per week by renting out as front house and studio apartment at rear.
Good location close to Yarraman / Dandenong Stations, schools, bus and easy access to Dandenong CBD and all major arterials.
Don’t miss out on this great opportunity - inspect today!

Perfect opportunity to capitalise on the ever popular Dandenong market. Whether you're a first home buyer, investor looking to add to your portfolio or someone looking at downsizing, this unit has everything at your door step, The property is only five minutes drive to the Dandenong C.B.D. Description:
IMMACULATE HOME ON CORNER BLOCK
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT INSPECTION
Sitting on a glorious corner block is this immaculate three bedroom home. With perfectly maintained front and rear yards, this home is impeccable from start to end. Upon walking inside you will find three oversized bedrooms to your left which flow through to a bathroom with both shower and bath and separate laundry. The spotless kitchen features a double sink, plenty of cupboards, gas cooking and a huge window that lets the natural light flow through to your meals area. Relax in the light filled central lounge knowing that your ducted heating will keep you warm throughout the winter. Boasting a double garage and second kitchen area with external veranda, there's room for everyone here. Only minutes from one shopping strip and a short drive from central Dandenong itself, this home is bursting with potential.
If you've been waiting for a property that has been lovingly maintained with sub division potential (STCA) then this is it.

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY AT 1.00PM
A classic home on a block of approximately 735m2 presents an ideal investment and development opportunity. Walking distance to 3 schools; Dandenong Primary School, St Johnâ??s Regional College and Maranatha Junior School, as well as being within close proximity to a range of fantastic amenities including Clow Street Reserve, Dandenong Park, Dandenong Plaza and the vibrant Dandenong Markets.
A fantastic location and large block combine to make the perfect opportunity for new development (STCA). The spacious interiors of the existing home include a formal entry, large living room, an open plan kitchen and meals area, two large bedrooms, central bathroom, laundry and sunroom. The kitchen includes a 4 burner gas cooktop, gas oven and lots of cupboard space. Other features of the home include a gas heater, high ceilings, original decorative cornices and retro light fittings. Outside you will find a rear pergola, large yard, storage shed and garage with workshop space. The long driveway also provides space for additional car parking.
Positioned only minutes to the Monash Freeway, South Gippsland Highway and Eastlink, located in the heart of numerous school zones and so close to the endless conveniences of the Dandenong Shopping and Market precinct, this classic home is the perfect opportunity for the first home owner, savvy investor or focused developer. Call us today to discuss the potential of this primed property.

Description:
Dual occupancy 562m2
Perfect for first home buyers, the astute investor or developers alike with potential to build a second dwelling at the back of this existing home (STCA), as well as being located in a position that offers outstanding convenience.
Sitting on a generous sized block (562m2 approx.) this home features three well sized bedrooms, bathroom and kitchen with meals area, lounge with gas heater, split system heating and cooling, and plenty of car space. Additionally there is a separate laundry. Also featuring a large driveway that has tremendous potential to build another home (stca). Currently tenanted $1300 per month.
A location such as this one is high in demand, with school like St Johns Regional College and Dandenong Primary School, train stations, bus tops, major freeways, shops, all short distance away. Nothing gets better than this when it comes to location.
Dont miss an opportunity to inspect this property in a highly sought out location, before its too late!

Description:
GROUND FLOOR APARTMENT WITH GARAGE!
Set in a small block of seven, this neat ground floor apartment offers two large bedrooms with built in robes, very spacious formal lounge, kitchen/meals area, combined bathroom/laundry, separate toilet and a lock up garage on separate Title.
Short walk to station, bus stop, shopping centre and many other central facilities.
Immediate Vacant Possession available. Potential rental of $280.00 to $290.00 per week.
LIKE IT? DON'T HESITATE!

Description:
Easy living - Next to everything for next to nothing!
This spacious, affordable 2 bedroom unit ticks all the boxes for owner occupiers and investors alike! Spacious living in the heart of Dandenong, all that's left to do is move in and enjoy. Central and convenient location - just minutes walk to shops, cafes and everything Dandenong has to offer including train station just around the corner!
Featuring 2 large bedrooms, separate kitchen with upright stove, separate living area, fully tiled bathroom, separate toilet plus separate car space.
Fabulous first time investment! You will not want to miss out!
In-Room Auction
Wednesday 11th October at 6:30pm
Sandown Regency, 477 Princes Hwy, Noble Park
